about.brand: Greekaway is a curated travel experience platform offering small-group excursions (5–7 travelers) across Greece. Each trip combines culture, nature, and comfort, focusing on authentic experiences rather than mass tourism.

trips.name: Delphi & Arachova
trips.description: Day trip combining ancient history and mountain charm. Includes visit to the archaeological site of Delphi, the Temple of Apollo, and leisure time in Arachova village.

trips.name: Lefkada Island Experience
trips.description: Sea and nature adventure including beach hopping, local cuisine, and scenic viewpoints of the Ionian islands.

trips.name: Ancient Olympia
trips.description: Cultural full-day trip exploring the birthplace of the Olympic Games, museum visit, and lunch at a traditional taverna.

booking.steps: The booking process includes: selecting date and seats, entering traveler details, confirming payment through Stripe, and receiving an automatic confirmation email.
booking.availability: Each excursion operates ideally with 5–7 participants. The system shows seat availability (e.g., 4/6) to help travelers join compatible groups.

profile.purpose: Traveler profiles help Greekaway create balanced groups based on personality type and travel style (e.g., Explorers, Relaxed Travelers, Family Style, Solo Adventurers).
profile.fields: Profiles may include age range, language preference, social style, and trip interests.

faq.question: Why do I need to fill out my traveler profile?
faq.answer: Your profile helps Greekaway group you with travelers who match your style, ensuring a more harmonious and enjoyable experience.

faq.question: Can I cancel or change my booking?
faq.answer: Yes, cancellations or modifications are accepted according to the Greekaway terms and refund policy. Details are shown at checkout.

faq.question: What payment methods are supported?
faq.answer: Greekaway supports Stripe payments, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and major credit cards.

policies.terms: All excursions follow the Greekaway Terms & Conditions, which ensure fair booking, refund, and travel safety practices.
policies.privacy: Greekaway respects user privacy. Personal data is used only for trip coordination and never shared with third parties.
